DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the predefined types of cable carrier fitting from which the type required may be set.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcCableCarrierFittingType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no cable carrier fitting type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcCableCarrierFittingType_.
